description: THAT1583 Low-Noise Differential Audio Preamplifier configured as LNA
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 1.1 nV/√Hz input noise at 1 kHz)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (1 MHz typical for THAT1583 audio preamp)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (20 kOhm typical for audio preamp)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (typical ±15V supply, output swing to ±13.5V)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (1.1 nV/√Hz at 1 kHz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (1 µA typical)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (200 µV maximum from datasheet)
